testcase.title: rhsm.cli.tests.ListTests.ListConsumedWithWildcardMatches_Test
testcase.description: subscription-manager: subcription manager list --consumed with wildcard --matches on Subscription Name, Provided Product Name, Contract Number, SKU, Service Level, Provided Product ID. Note: wildcard match means * matches zero or more char and ? matches one char and is case insensitive.
